dcterms:description: The mountain car environment from OpenAI Gym is an optimal control problem in which a car needs to build up speed in order to escape a valley. The goal is to reach a target state with the least effort.
dcterms:title: Mountain Car

dcterms:description: The cartpole is a classical control problem where a pendulum mounted on a cart must be balanced in the upper equilibrium by accelerating the cart left or right.
dcterms:title: Cartpole

dcterms:description: The current control of electrical drives is a control problem of industrial relevance that can be solved using reinforcement learning, featuring a reference vector for optimal tracking control.
dcterms:title: Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor Current Control
